video.title: Hacking Web Performance
video.description:
This talk covers extreme web performance techniques that will blow your mind, from new compression algorithms and new image formats to client hints and HTTP/2 push. Watch to learn how to hack web performance.

Talk by Max Firtman at Heapcon 2018. Talk under the creative commons license.

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org
